    \label{genetic_fuzzy_logic_classifier:GeneticFuzzyLogicClassifier:generate_membership_functions}
    \index{genetic\_fuzzy\_logic\_classifier \textit{(module)}!genetic\_fuzzy\_logic\_classifier.GeneticFuzzyLogicClassifier \textit{(class)}!genetic\_fuzzy\_logic\_classifier.GeneticFuzzyLogicClassifier.generate\_membership\_functions \textit{(method)}}

    \vspace{0.5ex}

\hspace{.8\funcindent}\begin{boxedminipage}{\funcwidth}

    \raggedright \textbf{generate\_membership\_functions}(\textit{self}, \textit{divisions}={\tt 3}, \textit{do\_not\_use\_prop}={\tt 0.3})

    \vspace{-1.5ex}

    \rule{\textwidth}{0.5\fboxrule}
\setlength{\parskip}{2ex}
    Divide each attribute into partitions consisting of *divisions* number.
    For example if we have 4 divisions we will create 15 functions per 
    variables because of (2 + 3 + 4 + 5 ) plus one do not care function.

\setlength{\parskip}{1ex}
    \end{boxedminipage}
